banner.text:
Your Hero is ready to go!
P.S. You can zoom out by clicking on the minus (–) button next to the trashcan.
All the code for this part of the game is going to go in one event.
Grab this event block...
...and drop it anywhere in your code space.

Can you see the new 'Dot' object? It's a yellow rectangle...
That's your treasure! The code to control it is in here.

Set the co-ordinates, or the location, of the treasure with code.
Grab a 'set x' block...
...and connect it to your event.

Let's make the treasure appear randomly from left to right.
Can you find the random number block in the Math tray?
Grab the random number block.
Connect it to ''dot set x to''.

The lightboard is 16 pixels wide.
Change it from 10 to 16.
Now let's change the y-position.
Fetch the block that will change y...
...and connect it below ''dot set x to''.
Can you remember where to find a random number?
Set the y position with a random number too.
Now let's make the treasure appear randomly up and down the board.

Make your Hero can find treasure on the whole board.
Change 10 to 8.
Every time the app runs, the treaure will appear in a random spot on your pixel kit!
Brilliant! Next you’ll give your Hero the power to collect the treasure.
